title: Full Stack Developer (Next.js)
summary: We are looking for a skilled Full Stack Developer to build and maintain scalable, modern web applications. The role involves working across frontend, backend integration, and deployment, with a focus on performance, usability, and clean architecture.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain modern web applications using Next.js and React
Build responsive and accessible user interfaces using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS
Integrate frontend applications with backend APIs and services
Work with application architecture concepts such as SSR, CSR, ISR, and authentication flows
Manage deployment workflows, environment configurations, and build optimizations
Collaborate with cross-functional teams on code reviews and technical discussions
Debug, optimize, and maintain production-grade applications
requirements: Hands-on experience with React.js and Next.js
Solid understanding of HTML5, CSS3, and Tailwind CSS
Familiarity with full stack and frontend architecture principles
Experience with Git and collaborative development workflows
Basic knowledge of deployment platforms such as Netlify or Vercel
preferredQualifications: Experience with backend development using Node.js
Knowledge of Docker and containerized application workflows
Basic cloud platform familiarity (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
Experience working with databases such as MongoDB or PostgreSQL
Exposure to CI/CD pipelines and production monitoring
benefits: Opportunity to work on real-world, production-grade applications
growthOpportunities: Opportunity to grow into senior engineering roles, take ownership of features, and contribute to architectural decisions.

applicationDetails.hiringProcess: Resume review → Technical discussion → Final interview

title: Digital Marketing Executive
summary: We are looking for a results-driven Digital Marketing Executive to plan, execute, and optimize digital campaigns that strengthen brand visibility, generate qualified leads, and support business growth across multiple online channels.
responsibilities: Plan and execute digital marketing campaigns across search, social, and email channels
Manage and optimize paid and organic campaigns to drive traffic and conversions
Create and publish content in collaboration with design and content teams
Monitor campaign performance using analytics tools and prepare performance reports
Optimize website and landing pages for SEO and user engagement
Manage social media presence and audience engagement across platforms
Stay updated with digital marketing trends, tools, and best practices
requirements: Strong understanding of digital marketing fundamentals
Hands-on experience with SEO, SEM, and social media marketing
Familiarity with analytics tools such as Google Analytics or similar platforms
Ability to interpret data and derive actionable insights
Ability to manage multiple campaigns and deadlines
preferredQualifications: Experience running paid campaigns (Google Ads, Meta Ads, LinkedIn Ads)
Knowledge of marketing automation or email marketing tools
Basic understanding of content strategy and conversion optimization
Experience working in B2B or professional services marketing
benefits: Exposure to brand, performance, and growth marketing
growthOpportunities: Opportunity to grow into senior marketing, performance marketing, or digital strategy roles.

applicationDetails.hiringProcess: Resume review → Marketing discussion → Final interview
